definitions.text: a person who owes allegiance to that nation
examples: a monarch has a duty to his subjects

definitions.text: of or relating to or belonging to a nation or country
limited to or in the interests of a particular nation
examples: isolationism is a strictly national policy

definitions.text: concerned with or applicable to or belonging to an entire nation or country
owned or maintained for the public by the national government

examples: the British Home Office has broader responsibilities than the United States Department of the Interior

definitions.text: characteristic of or peculiar to the people of a nation
